Uses of Class
edu.rit.draw.item.Group

Packages that use Group
edu.rit.compbio.phyl Package edu.rit.compbio.phyl contains parallel programs for phylogenetic tree construction. 
edu.rit.draw Package edu.rit.draw contains classes and programs for drawing diagrams and slides of all kinds. 
edu.rit.draw.item Package edu.rit.draw.item contains classes for the different kinds of drawing items that can appear in a Drawing. 
 

Uses of Group in edu.rit.compbio.phyl
 

Methods in edu.rit.compbio.phyl with parameters of type Group
 void TreeDrawing.draw(DnaSequenceTree tree, Group group)
          Draw a picture of the given tree.
 void TreeDrawing.draw(String tree, Group group)
          Draw a picture of the given tree string.
 

Uses of Group in edu.rit.draw
 

Methods in edu.rit.draw that return Group
 Group Drawing.asGroup()
          Returns a Group consisting of the drawing items in this drawing.

Constructors in edu.rit.draw.item with parameters of type Group
Group(Group theGroup)
          Construct a new group that contains the same drawing items, has the same transforms, and is at the same location, as the given group.
